 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׂכִּין‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==knife== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַכִּין‎</span>; probably loanword ([[BDB#Lewy|Lewy]]<sup> Fremdw. 176</sup>) from Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סַכִּינְא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***, whence also Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup> M 125</sup> [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>84</sup>; √ dubious); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span> [[Prov.23.2|Prov 23:2]].
